about.missionContent1: Manufarmu ita ce tallafa wa al'ummominmu na Bitcoin ta hanyar ilmantarwa da kuma hanyar sadarwa. Domin tabbatar da hakan, muna tattarawa, tsarawa, da samar da abubuwan da ake buƙata kamar kwasa-kwasai, littattafai, fastoci, filayoyi, bidiyoyi domin bunƙasa masana'antar Bitcoin.
about.missionContent2: Muna tattara ilimi don mu rarraba shi yadda ya dace ta hanyar wani sauƙaƙƙen dandalin GitHub da ilimin da ake koyo daka yanar gizo-gizo wanda ke da harsuna daban-daban. Muna taimaka wa cibiyoyin Bitcoin na gida su haɓaka tare da kayan aikin da suka dace don basirar su ta bunƙasa.
about.commitmentContent:
Damuwarmu ga al'ummar Bitcoin sun hada da wadannan:
 • Za mu ci gaba da kasancewa a cikin manyan kayayyakin samfura
 • Za mu bayar da ilimin inganci na samfura
 • Za mu fassara abubuwanmu a cikin yawan harsuna da yawa da yawa
 • Za mu tallafawa masu gina Bitcoin a tafiyar su na kasuwanci
about.coreTeamContent: PlanB Network ya hada dubban mambobi da dama, malamai, jagoranci na al'umma, masana'antu, masu kirkira, da kuma masu shiryawa. Muna godiya sosai ga dukkan mutane da suka taimaki PlanB kuma suke ci gaba da yin hakan a kowace rana. (Shafin masu taimakawa zaizo nan ba da jimawa ba)
about.coreTeamRogzyRole: Shugaban guda narwa, da mataimakin shugaba
about.corporateContent: PlanB Network haɗin gwiwar ayyukan ƙungiyoyi guda uku ne da suka mayar da hankali kan cigaban Bitcoin. A cikin yunƙurin samar da ingantacciyar hanyar ilimin Bitcoin mai girma, sun yanke shawarar haɗa kai don kafa PlanB Network. Tun daga lokacin, wasu ƙungiyoyi da dama sun yanke shawarar bada gudummawa tare da haɗa ƙarfinsu don taimaka mana wajen yada ilimin Bitcoin a duniya. Saboda haka, muna mika godiya mai yawa a gare su.
about.storyContent: PlanB Network wata ƙungiya ce da ke tallafawa ilimin Bitcoin a faɗin duniya. Haɗin kai ne na kamfanoni daban-daban masu ƙwazo kan Bitcoin waɗanda suka mayar da hankali kan ilimi, software mai budadden tushe(Open Source), hanyoyin sadarwa na kai tsaye (peer-to-peer), da kuma gina al'umma. Tare, sun yanke shawarar gina PlanB Network don samar da ingantattun kayan aikin da za su taimaka wa tsarin Bitcoin ya bunƙasa. Anan zaku samu bayanan da muka wallafa a 2023.
about.description: PlanB Network tana taimaka wa al'ummomi a faɗin duniya su tsara kansu yadda ya dace don samar da ingantaccen ilimi. Manhajar yana da muhimman kayan aiki don cimma wannan buri ta hanyar makarantar yanar gizo, shafin koyarwa, kayan aikin ilimin Bitcoin, da kuma dandalin albarkatu.
about.subtitle: Kanason ka taimaka a wan nan sashe? To kashiga PlanB Network.
about.title: Bayani akan PlanB Network
about.manifesto:
Muna gaskatawa a kan al'amarin da Bitcoin ke ba mu na gaba mai tsada.

Misiyarmu ita ce, mu nuna Bitcoin ga mutane miliyan guda cikin shekaru goma, kuma kayan aikinmu sun hada da ilimi da bayani.

Muna goyon bayan al'ummar masu amfani da Bitcoin ta hanyar samar da bayanai na ilimi mai amfani da kuma samar da hanyar masu ilimi na Bitcoin.

Falsafarmu ta samu damar daga takardar cypherpunk. Kamar yadda suka goyi bayan sirri, muna goyi bayan ilimi. A gaskiya, muna gaskatawa cewa ilimi shi ne tsarin k freedom da canji.

Muna amfani da Bitcoin kawai.

Muna goyon bayan al'amarin da mutum ya dauki nauyin kansa da kuma yancin da ya samu ta hanyar mallakar makullansa.

Muna bukatar tabbatarwa, ba aminci mai kama ba.

Muna gaskatawa cewa ta hanyar gyara kuɗi, za mu iya gyara duniya.

Muna tsada da amfani da bayanai, ba mu da wani wurin da zai iya kawo matsala.

Muna goyon bayan yaduwar bayanai na mu.

Muna so mu sami duniya da ke aiki daga kasa zuwa sama, inda mutum yana a tsakiya.

Muna saukaka, muna koyar da, muna raba.

Ku biyo mu a cikin misiyarmu na orange-pill duniya!

bCertificate.challengeYourself: Kama da kai da tabbatar da darajarka!
bCertificate.curious: Kana son sanin abin da jarabawar zata kasance?
bCertificate.joeNakamotoVideo: Me ce-ce wani jarabawar Bitcoin ne? Da Joe Nakamoto
bCertificate.noBookExam: Babu wata jarabawa da aka tsara har yanzu.
bCertificate.organizeTitle: Kana son shirya jarrabawar takaddar ₿ a cibiyarka?
bCertificate.organizeSubtitle: Gabatar da Bitcoin ga mutane biliyan ɗaya ba abu ne mai sauƙi ba
bCertificate.bCertificateDescription: Takaddar ₿ wata jarrabawa ce da ake amincewa da ita a duniya baki ɗaya wadda ke tantance ƙwarewarka a kan Bitcoin da batutuwan da suka shafi shi. Wannan takaddar za ta ba ka damar tabbatar da ƙwarewarka da iliminka a masana'antar Bitcoin, wanda zai ba ka damar samun damar shiga kamfanoni mafi kyau da samun manyan mukamai na aiki.
bCertificate.organizeDescription: Babu matsala! Idan al'ummarka tana cikin Cibiyar, za ku iya shirya zama na jarrabawa a cibiyarku. Da fatan za ku karanta tsarin dokoki don tabbatar da cewa kuna bin sharuddan da ake buƙata don karɓar jarrabawa. Idan za ku iya cika waɗannan sharuddan, za ku iya tsara zamanku sannan ku ƙara shi a dandalin.
bCertificate.pageSubtitle: Samun karbuwa ilimi ta hanyar cibiya bai daya na bayani mai ginshiki
bCertificate.tweetText:
Muna taya murna bisa samun nasarara da takardar shaidar B (B-Certificate) a @planb_network da maki {{score}}/100 a jarrabawar ƙarshe! {{emoji}}

{{certificateUrl}}

bet.contributeButton: Ka taimaka ka bada gudun mowa

bet.pageSubtitle: BET - Kayan aiki na Bitcoin mai asali na bude ga dukkanin ayyukan ilimi

visualContent.description: Hotunan da ke ƙasa zasu iya amfani da su don abubuwan da kake ƙirƙira.
visualContent.title: Abun da ake gani

bet.contribute: Wannan kayan aiki yana bukatar taimako. Yana amfani da Figma, don haka duk wanda zai iya ƙara, gyara ko fassara. Don aiki tare, ƙara ƙungiya ko magana, kada ka manta ka shiga discord namu.
bet.pageDescription: Yada amfani ga jama'a ba abu ne mai sauƙi ba. Don mu kusanci wannan buri cikin sauri, mun haɓaka wani ɗakunan bayanai na abun cikin ilimi wanda za a iya faɗaɗa. A nan, malaman Bitcoin za su iya saka da samun abun ciki cikin sauƙi gwargwadon bukatarsu. Bari mu daina ƙirƙirar abin da ya riga ya wanzu, mu haɗa kai domin tattara mahimman albarkatu a cikin kayan aiki guda!

bookSummary.notice: Wannan takaitaccen bayanin yana da alaƙa da Github, domin wani gyara ko ƙari
bookSummary.title: Littafin a takaice
bookSummary.noSummary: Ba a rubuta takaitaccen bayani ba tukuna. Idan ka karanta littafin kuma kana son bada gudunmawwarka, kada ka yi shakkar rubuta shi a Github. Zai taimaka wa al'umma sosai, kuma zai inganta kayan aikin jami'ar, har ma kana iya samun wasu 'sats' saboda ƙoƙarinka!

explorer.buildPath: Ka gina naka tafarki a cikin zurfin bincike
explorer.findCourses: Nemo cikakken karatun da ya dace da bukatunka godiya ga zaɓin karatu
explorer.footerTitle: Malamai mu na nan domin ku!
explorer.journey: Bitcoin shine tafiya, ba wani wurin da za'a kai ba
explorer.pageSubtitle: Samun karbuwa ilimi ta hanyar cibiya bai daya na bayani mai ginshiki
explorer.pageTitle: Barka da zuwa Makarantar Plan B
explorer.s2p2: Zaka iya zaɓar hanya da kake so kuma ka ci gaba da ita, samar da kwarewa da sanin har da farin ciki na kai.
explorer.footerp1: A Jami'ar Sovereign, malamai mu suna da cikakken 'yancin kan su akan abun cikin su da kayan aikin da suke so ka bincika, muddin sun bi ka'idojin ɗabi'a. Suna da sha'awar Bitcoin daga fannoni daban-daban.
explorer.footerp2: Idan ka so ka gyara koyarwa ko ka shaida na kanka, za ka iya yin hakan da sauki ta hanyar GitHub repository. Maimakon haka, don samar da taimako ga malami, akwai yawa dabi'u: za ka iya bayar da ra'ayi kan koyarwa, ka bada albashin malami daidai, ko ka zama dan kasuwa na jami'a don taimaka da ci gaban dandamali.
explorer.pageDescription: Makarantar Plan B na da niyyar sauya ilimin Bitcoin a duniya. An tattara shi ta hanyar masu mahimmanci daga sauran fannoni, makarantarmu ta samar da nau'ikan ilimi da suka kai ga kowane bangare na Bitcoin. Daga na farko zuwa na sani, ko a kan hanyarka ta kansa ko kuma an biyo ta makaranta a kowane mako ta hanyar malami, muna fatan za a iya taimakawa ka fahimci mafi girma na abin da ke cikin Bitcoin. Babban bangaren nau'ikanmu suna kawai kyauta domin kowace mutum, a kowace wurare, zai iya samun damar ilimi.
explorer.s2p1: Idan ka fara bincika zurfin Bitcoin, dole ne ka san cewa hanya ce mara iyaka tare da hanyoyi da dama. A nan jami'ar, mun fahimci wannan kuma mun tsara abun cikin iliminmu yadda zai kasance ba mai layi guda ba, mai 'yancin kai, da kuma fadi sosai.
explorer.s2p3: Dukkan darussanmu kyauta ne gaba ɗaya, don haka babu abin da zai tsayar da ku!
explorer.s2t1: Ilmin Bitcoin tafiya ce, ba matsaya ba.
explorer.s3t1: Ka gina naka tafarki a cikin zurfin bincike

payment.book_description:
Da fatan za a duba bayanan wurin da aka bayar.
Da zarar an kammala tanadin ka/ki, za mu aika maka/ki da tikiti na tabbaci da QR code don nunawa a wurin taron.
payment.access_invoice: Za ka iya samun takardar biyan kudi ta hanyar duba dashbord ɗinka
payment.qr_unified: Wannan lambar QR na gaba daya, don haka yana karɓar biyan kuɗin da ke lightning da on-chain.
payment.inPersonCallout: Ka/kina gab da sayan damar shiga wannan kwas na fuska-da-fuska.
payment.onlineCallout: Ka/kina gab da sayan damar shiga wannan kwas ta yanar gizo.
payment.onlineDescription:
Kowane zaman ajin ana watsa shi kai tsaye a dandalin.
Wannan sayan zai ba ka/ki damar shiga watsawar kai tsaye da bidiyon maimaitawa.
payment.inPersonDescription:
Kowane zaman ajin yana gudana a zahiri a kwanaki da wuraren da aka sa, kuma ana watsa shi kai tsaye a dandalin.
Wannan sayan zai ba ka/ki damar shiga ajin na zahiri da na kan layi(online).
Kada ka/ki manta da kama kujerarka/ki don ajin da ka/kike son halarta a zahiri.

exam.availableDashboard: Zai kasance a cikin dashboard ɗinku cikin ƙasa da awowi 10.
exam.congratulations: Muna taya murna, ka/kin kai ƙarshen wannan kwas!
exam.certificateAvailable: Zai kasancewa nan da kusan awowi 8 bayan aika shi.
exam.instantVerification: Tabbaci na nan take: Ma’aikata za su iya sauƙin tabbatar da ingancin digirinka da ranar bayarwa.
exam.notTranslatedYet: Muna bada hakuri, amma fasalin jarrabawar ƙarshe bai samu ba a yaren da ka zaɓa. Za ka iya zaɓar canza harshe don ci gaba.
exam.oopsFailed: Kash, alamu sun nuna cewa baka/ki ci jarrabawar ƙarshe ba.
exam.passRate: Yiyuwar cin nasara shine kashi 80% na maki.
exam.planBTimeStamp: A Plan ₿ Network, muna tabbatar da shaidar digirin ku ta hanyar fasahar saka lokaci da goyon bayan blockchain.
exam.quitWithoutSubmitting: Kash, alamu sun nuna cewa ka/kin bar shafin ba tare da ajiye amsoshinka/ki ba. Yin hakan ya soke gwajin.
exam.retakeInstructions: Ka/kina da minti 20 don amsa tambayoyi 40, kowacce tambaya tana da amsa guda ɗaya daidai. Za ka/ki iya zagayawa tsakanin tambayoyin kuma ka/ki aika da amsoshinka/ki a ƙarshe.
exam.sameRules: Kuna shirin kara ɗaukar jarrabawar ƙarshe. Dokokin jarabawar suna nan kamar yadda aka saba.
exam.skipExamDescription: Hakanan zaka/ki iya wuce jarrabawar kuma ka/ki ci gaba kai tsaye zuwa kammalawa ta hanyar danna maɓallin da ke ƙasa.
exam.sureSubmit: Ka/kin tabbatar da cewa za ka/ki aika jarrabawarka/ki?
exam.tamperProof: Tabbatarwa Mai Tsauri: Blockchain yana tabbatar da cewa ba wanda zai iya canza ko bogin takardun shaidarka/ki.
exam.testKnowledge: Yanzu da ka/kika kammala wannan kwas, bari mu gwada iliminka/ki.
exam.timeStampHowDescription: Lokacin da aka samar da digirinka, ana ƙirƙirar "fingernail" na dijital na musamman wanda aka adana a kan blockchain. Wannan yana sa adana shi ya zama dindindin kuma ba za a iya canza shi ba. Kowanne yunkuri na canza digirinka zai karya haɗin, wanda zai bayyana canjin.
exam.timerStart: Da zarar ka/kin danna Start, agogon lokaci na minti 20 zai fara.
exam.tryOneMoreTime: Bari mu kara gwadawa a sabon karo !
exam.dontGiveUpTryAgain:
Kada ka/ki karaya! 
Zaka/ki iya kara gwadawa bayan sa'o'i 24.
exam.findInformationChapter: Samu karin bayani a wannan babi :
exam.futureProof: Tabbatacce: Takardar shaidarka tana da kariya har abada kuma tana da inganci koda yaushe.
exam.globallyRecognized: Amincewa ta Duniya: Takardar shaida mai ɗauke da bayanan blockchain ana amincewa da ita a duk faɗin duniya.
exam.verifyDisplayName: Kafin ka/ki fara, don Allah ka/ki tabbatar da sunan da aka nuna a ƙasa, domin za a yi amfani da shi wajen samar maka da takardar shaidar kammala karatunka/ki.
exam.whyTimeStamp:
Yin Lura da Lokacin Takardar Shaida Ta Hanyar Timestamp: 
Me Yasa Yake Da Mahimmanci
exam.wishTryAgain: Idan ka/kina son sake gwadawa, za a sake ba da damar jarabawar bayan awanni 24.
exam.congratulationsPassed: Muna taya murna, ka/kin <0>ci nasara</0> a jarabawar ƙarshe!
exam.dontWorry: Kada ka/ki damu da kuskure; wannan jarabawar tana taimakawa wajen karfafa koyonka/ki. Idan ba ka/ki ci nasara ba, za ka/ki iya kara gwadawa bayan sa'o'i 24.
exam.examDetails: Jarabawar tana da tambayoyi masu zaɓuɓɓuka guda 40, kowacce tambaya tana da amsa guda ɗaya dai-dai. Za ka/ki iya canza amsoshinka/ki a kowane lokaci kafin ka/ki aika, muddin agogon ƙididdiga yana gudana.

bCertificate.noResults:
Har yanzu ba a haɗa kowanne daraja ko takaddar shaida da wannan asusun ba.
Idan ka wuce jarrabawa kuma sakamakon ka ba ya samuwa bayan wani lokaci mai tsawo, da fatan za ka tuntube mu don samun taimako.

course.feedbacks: Akwai wani babi a ƙarshen kwas ɗinnan da aka keɓe don ra'ayoyi. Idan kuna son ba da ra'ayinku yanzu, za ku iya yin hakan anan.

credentials.seatBooked: An adana wurin zamanka/ki na jarabawar
credentials.courseDiplomasSubtitle: A nan zaka/ki iya samun cikakkun bayanai game da duk gwaje-gwajen da ka/kika yi bayan kammala kwas ɗin akan dandalin.
credentials.bCertificateSubtitle: A nan za ka iya samun cikakkun bayanai game da ajiyar ka da darajojin takardun shaida na ₿ da ka gabatar da kuma waɗanda za su zo nan gaba. Takardar shaida ta ₿ jarabawar tebur ce da Plan ₿ Network ke shiryawa don tantance matakin ka/ki gameda Bitcoin da batutuwan da suka shafe shi.
credentials.beingGraded: Ana duba jarabawar ka/ki. Sakamakon zai kasance cikin makonni 1 ko 2.

missed.missedp2: Kada a damu! Muna adana duk taron da ya gabata da aka gudanar a cikin Network, wanda ke ba kowa damar sake kallo kyauta kan abin da suka rasa.
missed.missedh1: Tarurrukan da suka gabata don sake kallo

newEvent.description: Tabbas! Duk taron Bitcoin na iya ƙara fitowar su anan, don haka kowanne ƙoƙari don ƙirƙirar sabon taro yana maraba da shi :)
newEvent.subtitle: Barewa mutane biliyan ba karamin abu ba ne
newEvent.title: Kuna son ƙara taron ku?

events.pageDescription: Kuna son tattauna Bitcoin kai tsaye? Anan, za ku iya samun dukkan tarurrukan da al'ummomin Plan B Network ke goyon baya. Ko kuna son sauraron laccoci, tattauna Bitcoin yayin sha ko kuma yin jarrabawa don tantance iliminku, za ku samu taron da ya dace a nan ta hanyar Plan B Network.

payment.callout_online: Ana kokarin tanadar wurin zama ta kafar yanar gizo domin halartar wannan taro.
payment.access_invoice: Za ku iya ganin takardar biyan kudinku a dashbod.
payment.access_online_successful: Lokacin da taron ya fara, shiga cikin dandalin don samun damar kallo kai tsaye a shafin taron.
payment.access_physical_successful: Za ku iya sauke tikitinku anan, ko kuma sauke shi daga baya a dashbod ɗinku.
payment.additional_free_description: Wannan taron kyauta ne, don haka babu caji don tanadin wannan wurin zama. Duk da haka, a tabbatar an halarta, saboda adadin wuraren zama a kayyade yake.
payment.callout_physical: Ana kusa da tanadin damar shiga wannan taron a zahiri.
payment.callout_replay: Ana kusa da tanadin damar samun maiamicin bidiyon wannan taron.
payment.description_online:
Don Allah, duba kwanan wata da lokacin taron da aka bayar.
Yayin da lokacin ya zo, shiga cikin adireshin domin samun shirin zama mai zaman kansa ta shafin taron.
payment.description_physical:
Don Allah, ka duba bayanin wurin da aka bayar.
Idan an tabbatar da shigar da kai, zamu fitar da tikiti da za ka nuna a wannan taron. Wannan tikiti zai ba ka damar shiga cikin shirin zancen da kuma kallon bidiyo na sake, idan akwai.
payment.description_free_physical:
Don Allah, ka duba bayanin wurin da aka bayar.
Idan an tabbatar da hasashen, zamu fitar da tikiti na tabbatarwa da lambar QR da za'a nuna a taron.
payment.enjoy: Muna fatan za ku ji dadin shi :)

main.currentEvents: Tarurrukan da ke faruwa a halin yanzu

glossary.filterBar: Sami kalmar da kake bukata nan

glossary.needHelp: Ka na bukatr taimako wajen bayyana kalmar fasaha?
glossary.notTranslated:
Bayanin a cikin fayil na alfarma ba a tarjama shi ba har yanzu.
Idan kana so ka taimaka, ka yi kokari ka taimaka a kan shafinmu

library.pageSubtitle: Wannan ɗakin karatu na buɗe-kai ne kuma ana iya ba da gudunmawa.

nodeNetwork.answer1: Node wani shiri ne na ilimi ne da aka danganta da al'umma a wani wuri a duniya. Zai iya zama ginin da ake koyon Bitcoin a ciki, amma ba a iyakance shi ga haka ba. Network na Plan B na gudanar da cibiyoyi, amma kafa su a kowane birni a duniya ba zai yiwu ba. Shi ya sa muke dogaro da al'umma na masu amfani da Bitcoin don taimaka mana wajen sauya wannan hanyar sadarwa ta duniya zuwa zahiri.
nodeNetwork.answer4: Node na Bitcoin na iya kasancewa a kowanne girma. Bisa wasu buƙatu, za a ba da matsayi daban-daban. Node sun hada da hackerspace, ɗakin motsa jiki, da wasu wuraren ofis zai fi kama da citadel.
nodeNetwork.description1: Plan B Network na goyon bayan shirye-shiryen ilimi a duniya baki ɗaya. Muna haɗin gwiwa don ƙirƙirar mafi kyawun kayan aiki don waɗannan ayyukan, ta hanyar dandamalinmu da kuma a zahiri. Ko yaushe muna neman sababbin nodes don shiga cikinmu. Idan kuna son yin aiki tare don ƙirƙirar hanyar sadarwa ta ilimi ta duniya mai rarrabuwa don Bitcoin, tuntuɓe mu!
nodeNetwork.answer2: Ta hanyar shiga cikin hanyar sadarwarmu, za ka samu damar samun abubuwan da ke ciki na musamman wadanda Plan B ke rarrabawa ta dandalinsa, wanda za ka iya rabawa mazauna nodenka. Muhimmin fa'ida shi ne bude hanyoyin tattaunawa don ayyukan nan gaba da haɗa kai da sauran al'ummomi a duniya don musayar gogewa.
nodeNetwork.answer3: A farko, Plan B Network na mayar da hankali kan wurare da ke da wurin aiki na zahiri. A nan gaba, muna shirin haɗa kowanne shiri da zai iya amfana daga goyon bayan hanyar sadarwar don ci gaba.
nodeNetwork.answer5: Muna son bayar da mafaka mai tsaro ga masu amfani da Bitcoin a duk duniya. Mun yarda cewa ta hanyar taimakawa wuraren haɗin gwiwa na gida su bunƙasa, za mu iya ƙirƙirar hanyar sadarwa na citadels inda masu amfani da Bitcoin za su iya aiki, ƙirƙira, raba, da tattaunawa cikin tsaro.
nodeNetwork.pageSubtitle: Kuna son kawo canji ga duniya da Bitcoin? Shiga cikin PlanB Network.
nodeNetwork.pageTitle: Bincika Hanyar Node ta Plan B
nodeNetwork.descriptionextend: Matakinmu na farko shi ne gayyatar al'ummomi da ke da wurare na zahiri, wanda muke kiran su da "full nodes" na cibiyarmu su kasance tare da mu. A nan gaba, yayin da cibiyarmu ke ƙarfafuwa, za mu faɗaɗa wannan gayyata ga ƙarin ƙungiyoyi a duk duniya. Idan kuna raba ƙimominmu, da fatan za ku tuntuɓi wakilanmu don shiga cikin cibiyarmu da taimakawa wajen gina mafi kyawun ilimin Bitcoin da zai yiwu.
nodeNetwork.mobiledescription: Muna yarda cewa ilimi bai kamata ya kasance kawai akan layi (online) ba, ya kamata a ce ya kasance a wurare na zahiri. Domin cimma wannan, Plan B Network na gudanar da hanyar sadarwa na cibiyoyi a duk duniya da kuma maraba da masu tunani, masu gina abubuwa, da malamai waɗanda ke haɓaka ci gaban Bitcoin da fasahohin 'yanci. Matakinmu na farko shi ne gayyatar al'ummomi da ke da wurare na zahiri, wanda muke kiran su da "full nodes" na cibiyarmu su kasance tare da mu. A nan gaba, yayin da cibiyarmu ke ƙarfafuwa, za mu faɗaɗa wannan gayyata ga ƙarin ƙungiyoyi a duk duniya. Idan kuna raba ƙimominmu, da fatan za ku tuntuɓi wakilanmu don shiga cikin cibiyarmu don taimakawa wajen gina mafi kyawun ilimin Bitcoin da zai yiwu.

resources.github: Dukkan wannan bayanin ana sarrafa shi ta hanyar wani rumbun ajiya na tushe na bude a <0>Github</0>. Za'a iya bada gudummawa da ƙara duk wani abu da bai bayyana ba.
resources.filterBarLabel: Nemo kayan aiki masu dacewa da bukatunku:
resources.pageDescription: Yin ƙoƙarin fahimtar Bitcoin kamar shiga wani sarƙaƙƙiya mai ci gaba da faɗaɗa. Don taimaka maka a cikin tafiyarka, mun tattara tarin albarkatu masu yawa ciki har da littattafai, faifai na sauti, bidiyo, da sake kunnawa na taruka. Wannan shafin yana haɗa dukkan bayanan a cikin wurin guda a GitHub domin taimaka maka ka fahimci tsarin Bitcoin da kyau.
resources.searchFilterName: Yi amfani da suna ka bincika
resources.pageSubtitle: Tsara sanin ilimi don inganta yaduwar shi
resources.pageTitle: Barka da zuwa dandalin samun bayanai
resources.headerText: Maraba da shiga cikin ramin Rabbit zomo mara iyaka na Bitcoin! A wannan sashin, za mu ba ku cikakkiyar koyarwa kan mafi yawan ayyukan Bitcoin. Wannan shafin yana kulawa da masu son wannan aikin tushen bude (open source). Idan anji mun yi kuskure, don Allah a tuntube mu. Don ganin alaƙar mu ta kudi da aikin, duba rahotonmu na bayyana gaskiya. Mun gode da amincewarku a wannan jami'a. da fatan kuma za ku ji dadin tafiyar.

payment.terms: Duba <0>sharuddanda ka'idoji</0> namu don bayanai kan dawo da kuɗi

podcasts.pageSubtitle: Wannan portal yana da tushe na bude kuma yana bude don gudummawa.

professors.pageSubtitle: Duk malamanmu masu sa kai ne kuma masu sha'awar Bitcoin. Za ka iya ba su kyauta don nuna godiya.

tips.noTipsYet: Wannan malamin ba ya karɓar kyauta a halin yanzu.
tips.thanks: Muna godiya da goyon bayan aikin {{name}} !
tips.thanksNoName: Na gode da goyon bayan aikina !

proofreading.description: An fassara asalin abun ciki da AI, amma dubawar mutune yana da muhimmanci don tabbatar da ingancinsa.
proofreading.inProgress: Ana ci gaba da duba kurakurai
proofreading.thanks: Godiya ta masumman ga masu duba ayyukanmu!

blogPageStrings.noArticlesText: A halin yanzu, babu rubutun blog.
blogPageStrings.blogSidebarTitle: Rubutun da suka gabata a Hanyar sadarwa

publicCommunication.title: Sadarwa na jama'a
publicCommunication.description: A Plan B Network, muna alfahari da bin ka'idojin tushe na bude da kuma kiyaye gaskiya a duk tafiyarmu

notFound.pageSubtitle: Yana yiwuwa wani ya shiga cikin zurfin ramin zomo kuma ya ɓace. Don dawowa saman, danna

header.forEducators: Don samar da koyarwa da masu kirkira
header.content: Manufar dandamalin Plan ₿ Network ita ce samar da mafi kyawun kayan aiki da ilimi a fadin duniya, domin ba wa mutane damar sake samun 'yancinsu. Daga matakin mutum ɗaya har zuwa al'ummomi, muna nan don taimaka muku a tafiyarku ta Bitcoin.

tutorialSection.title: Ilimin Bitcoin ya sauya zuwa kalmar mai sauƙi.
tutorialSection.subtitle1: Mun taimaka maka waje fahimtar fasa ta hanyoyi da dama!
tutorialSection.content1: Bitcoin yana ci gaba da sauyawa, tare da fitowar sabbin masu ruwa da tsaki, mafita, tsarin sadarwa, da ci gaban fasaha. Saboda haka, yana iya zama kalubale a kiyaye ingantacciyar bayanai da darussan koyarwa da ke sabo. A nan a Plan ₿, mun cimma wannan nasara. Ko kai sabon shiga ne ko kuma mai gogewa, za ka iya samun darussa da dama don bincika masana'antarmu bisa bukatunka.

aboutUsSection.title: Su waye mu?
aboutUsSection.subtitle: Kadan daka cikin bayanan mu
aboutUsSection.content: Shirin ₿ Network yana tallafawa ilimin Bitcoin a duk faɗin duniya. Yana wakiltar haɗin gwiwar kamfanonin Bitcoin masu sha'awa waɗanda suka mayar da hankali kan ilimi, manhaja buɗaɗɗiya, hanyoyin sadarwa na abokan juna, da gina al'umma. Tare, sun ƙaddamar da wannan yunƙuri don samar da mahimman kayan aikin da ake buƙata don haɓaka tsarin Bitcoin.
aboutUsSection.openSourceContent: Muna inganta yaduwar ilimi cikin 'yanci kuma muna tallafawa al'amurra buɗaɗɗu
aboutUsSection.communityContent: Mu, da farko dai, al'umma ne na masu sha'awa da ke taimakon juna a tafiyar Bitcoin
aboutUsSection.privacyContent: Muna ganin sirri yana daga cikin haƙƙoƙin ɗan adam na asali da yake da muhimmanci wajen ci gaba
aboutUsSection.bitcoinFocusTitle: Abinda Bitcoin ya mayar da hankali akai
aboutUsSection.bitcoinFocusContent: Muna bincika juyin juya halin Bitcoin daga shimfida ta tushen zuwa mu'amalar juna da juna.

sectionEducation.title: Da ka dankoyo zuwa kwararre
sectionEducation.subtitle: Koyi Bitcoin a cibiyar ilimi
sectionEducation.content1: Bitcoin ba fasaha ba ce kawai da wani nau'in kuɗi, amma kuma wata hanyar juyin juya hali don kallon rayuwa. Bisa wannan fahimta, darasi ɗinmu suna rufe fannoni da dama, suna ba da dama ga mutane su yi fice a yankin da suka zaɓa, tare da faɗaɗa fahimtarsu. Daga darasin Bitcoin na farko har zuwa zurfin nazarin bayanan tsarin, za mu taimaka maka ka tafi cikin duniyar Bitcoin cikin aminci. Babu dalilin yin jinkiri. Ilimi na jiran ka.

sectionNetwork.title: Kutsa cikin Netwok din
sectionNetwork.subtitle: Guraren koyarwa na Bitcoin
sectionNetwork.content1: Hada kai da masu sha'awar Bitcoin daga fadin duniya da suke da irin wannan sha'awa. Daga ƙananan al'ummomi da ke haɗuwa akai-akai, zuwa cibiyoyin ilimin BTC, taswirar cibiyar sadarwarmu za ta taimaka maka samun ƙwarin gwiwa don koyo da gina abubuwa. Za ka samu nau'ikan ayyuka iri-iri, kamar cibiyar tallafi, tarukan bita na zahiri, taruka, wuraren hutu na BTC, da sauransu. Cibiyar a buɗe take ga kowa, don haka zo ka gaisa da al'ummar BTC na yankinka!

languageSection.title: Babu shingen yare a nan.
languageSection.subtitle: Komai ana fassara shi zuwa harsunan gida!
languageSection.content1: A PlanB, muna ganin Bitcoin juyin juya halin kasa da kasa ne da ya shafi kowa. Don karfafa miliyoyin mutane, muna ƙirƙirar wannan dandali don ya kasance mai harsuna da yawa da kuma samuwa ga kowa. Dandalin a halin yanzu yana goyon bayan harsuna 7, kuma ana ƙara wasu kowanne wata. Don cimma wannan, muna amfani da haɗin gwiwar AI da sha'awar masu Bitcoin daga ko ina cikin duniya.
languageSection.content2: Ku ma za ku iya fara gina hanyar sadarwarku ta gida a ƙasar ku!

patreonSection.title: Tare, mu inganta ilimin Bitcoin !
patreonSection.subtitle: Hanyar PlanB ta kasance 100% buɗaɗɗiyar hanya, godiya ga masu tallafawa masu kirki.
patreonSection.content: Hanyar PlanB tana alfahari da haɗin gwiwa da yawancin kamfanonin Bitcoin a duniya don samar da mafi kyawun kayan ilimi da za a iya samu !

wallOfLoveSection.title: Katangar kauna
wallOfLoveSection.subtitle: Abin yan Bitcoin ke cewa game da mu

details.author: Mawallafi
details.madeBy: Wanda yayi wan nan karatun shine
details.writtenBy: Wanda yayi wan nan karatun shine :
details.checkAuthor: Duba aikin da marubucin ya yi a wani bangare kuma kabashi goyon baya a sauran aikinsa.

tutorials.approvedByCreator: Wanda ya hada shi ya karba

centralized.description: Cibiyoyin musayar tsakiya yawanci kungiyoyi ne da ake tsara su waɗanda ke aiki a matsayin masu shiga tsakanin tsarin banki da tsarin Bitcoin. Suna ba ka damar siye da siyar da adadi mai yawa na Bitcoin kuma ka cire shi zuwa walat ɗinka ko asusun banki. Su kan buƙaci KYC, wanda ke nufin suna lura da ayyukanka, suna ba da rahoto ga hukumomin bincike na kuɗi domin bin doka na cikin gida.

exchange.description: Cibiyoyin musayar kuɗi su ne ɗaya daga cikin ƙofofin shiga da fita tsakanin kuɗin gargajiya (euro, daloli) da duniya ta Bitcoin. Cibiyoyin musayar kuɗi na iya zama waɗanda aka tsara su da bin KYC (Sanin Abokin Ciniki), ko kuma na musayar juna da ba a san wanda ke amfani da su ba. Kowanne cibiyar musayar kuɗi za ta bayar da siffofi daban-daban, tsarin kuɗi, ruwa, da tallafin abokin ciniki. Kowanne mai amfani da Bitcoin zai zaɓi daban-daban bisa ga bukatunsa da ra'ayinsa.
exchange.title: Musaya

peer-to-peer.description: Kasuwannin musayar juna suna kasancewa inda mutane ke musayar bitcoin don sauran kuɗaɗe a tsakaninsu. Wadannan kasuwannin na iya zama masu tsari ko kuma a'a, kuma yawanci ba sa neman bayanai da yawa (idan akwai) game da ku. Suna sauƙaƙe haɗin gwiwar tsakanin masu amfani. Kudin su na iya kasancewa mafi girma fiye da kasuwannin gargajiya, kuma ruwansu kaɗan ne. Wannan yana zama zaɓin da aka fi so ga masu amfani da bitcoin da ke ƙoƙarin guje wa KYC.

exchange.shortDescription: Hanyoyin saye-da-sayar da Bitcoin, KYC da ba KYC

mining.title: Haka
mining.description: Masana'antar hakar ma'adanai batu ne mai rikitarwa cike da ramukan zomo a ciki. A nan, za mu yi ƙoƙarin kasancewa tare da ku a cikin tafiyarku ta amfani da kayan aiki da manhaja. Daga gyara S9 zuwa na'urar dumama gida har zuwa ƙoƙarin lashe lottori tare da ƙwararren mahaƙi.

explorer.description: Dukkan waɗannan koyarwar an rubuta su ne ta hanyar masu son Bitcoin, waɗanda ke son yada ilimin Bitcoin a duk duniya. Kada ku manta ku yaba, ku yi sharhi, kuma ku ba su satoshi!

tutorials.headerText: ‫Maraba da shiga cikin ramin zomo mara iyaka na Bitcoin! A wannan sashin, za mu ba ku cikakken koyarwa kan mafi yawan ayyukan Bitcoin. Wannan shafin yana kulawa da masu son wannan aikin tushen bude (open source). Idan kuna jin mun yi kuskure, don Allah ku tuntube mu. Don ganin alaƙar mu ta kudi da aikin, duba rahotonmu na bayyana gaskiya. Mun gode da amincewarku a wannan jami'a, dafatan kuma za ku ji dadin tafiyar.

merchant.shortDescription: Hanyoyi don kasuwanci su karɓi Bitcoin
merchant.title: Mai sayarwa
merchant.description: Shin kuna tunanin yadda za ku sauƙaƙe karɓar bitcoin don kasuwanci? Bincika hanyoyinmu daban-daban don zama kwararre da samun sauƙin kafa hanyar karɓa ga shagunan da ke kewaye da ku. Hanyar Karɓar Kudi tana bambanta bisa ga bukatun mai sayarwa (na zahiri ko na yanar gizo), yawan su, da wahalar ayyukansu. Kyakkyawan misali shine farawa da dan karamin asusun LN, daga nan ku koma zuwa hanyar da ta dace da sauƙi (kamar PoS na wayar hannu), sannan ku bincika BTC Pay Server don hanyoyin ci gaba, masu dan tsauri, da hanyoyi na ƙwararru.

bitcoin.description: Node na Bitcoin Core shine tushen iko na zamantakewar Bitcoin dinku. Yana ba ku damar gudanar da software na Bitcoin kuma ku zama ɓangare na hanyar sadarwa. Za ku tabbatar da ƙananan ginshiƙai da mu'amaloli, ku yanke shawarar waɗanne dokoki kuke son amfani da su a cikin hanyar sadarwa, kuma ku dakatar da masu shiga tsakani don yada mu'amalolinku. Akwai hanyoyi da yawa don gudanar da node na Bitcoin, wasu suna da sauƙin amfani fiye da wasu.

node.description: Nodes suna kama da sabobin ku na kanku. A cikin Bitcoin, shine software da ke ba ku damar gudanar da hanyar sadarwa, tara mu'amaloli, tabbatar da dokoki, da zama ainihin mai iko. A cikin tsarin mu, akwai nodes daban-daban, daga Bitcoin Core, zuwa aiwatar da Lightning, RGB, ko wasu hanyoyin kariya na ci musamman.

lightning-network.description: Node na Lightning yana ba ku damar shiga cikin tsarin Bitcoin layer 2 da ake kira Lightning. Za ku iya bude tashoshi, sarrafa ruwa, shiga cikin zane, da zama marar tsaro game da walat ɗin ku na Lightning.
lightning-network.name: Hanyar Lightning

node.shortDescription: Hanyoyi don gudanar da node na Bitcoin da shiga cikin hanyar sadarwa
node.title: Node

rgb.description: RGB tsarin smart contracts ne mai iya girma da sirri don Bitcoin da hanyar Lightning. Wannan shine matakin shirye-shiryen Bitcoin, tare da ra'ayoyin mallaka na sirri da na juna, rarrabewa da ware abubuwa, kuma yana wakiltar "bayan blockchain".

others.shortDescription: Bincika koyarwa daban-daban kan batutuwa masu alaƙa da Bitcoin
others.description: Tsunduma cikin babban tarin koyarwar da ke da alaƙa da tunanin Bitcoin. Daga DIY zuwa koyarwar tushen bude, gano sabbin fannonin ilimi don zama mai iko fiye da yadda kuke.

DIY.description: Gano koyarwarmu ta DIY don koyon yadda za ku ƙirƙiri abubuwa da suka shafi Bitcoin, kwamfuta, da ikon kai da kanku!

OpenSource.description: Bincika koyarwarmu da aka sadaukar don amfani da kayan aikin tushen bude!

contribution.description: Koyi yadda za ku ba da gudummawa ga PlanB Network da kuma mallakar kayan aikin tushen bude da muke amfani da su a cikin gida ta hanyar koyarwarmu masu cikakken bayani!

general.description: Duba koyarwarmu na gabaɗaya don ƙara ilimin ku a fannin kwamfuta da sauran batutuwa da suka shafi ikon kai!

others.title: Sauran

tutorials.pageDescription: Bitcoin masana'antu ce mai faɗi, wacce ke ƙara faɗi kowace rana. Don taimaka muku bincike a kanta, mun tattara da tsara babban adadin koyarwar da ke bayyana hanyoyi daban-daban a duk fannonin da suka shafi Bitcoin.
tutorials.pageSubtitle: Buɗe sirrin Bitcoin ta hanyar bincika tsarinsa mai faɗi

privacy.description: Sirri hakki ne na asali. Duk da cewa muna fatan samun duniya inda sirri shine na asali, ba haka bane ainihin gaskiyar da muke rayuwa a ciki. Za mu yi ƙoƙarin bayyana muku kyawawan hanyoyin amfani, taimaka muku da koyarwa, da kuma sa ku kan hanya mai iko dangane da bayanan ku.
privacy.shortDescription: Kayan aikin ajiyar bayanai da kula da sirri
privacy.title: Sirri

bitcoin.description: Bitcoin ba a gina shi don zama mallakin wasu tsiraru ba, an tsara shi da niyya don zama na pseudonymous (wanda ba a sani ba), kuma kowace mu'amala tana bayyane a fili kuma tana adane har abada. Don dawo da wasu sirrin, dole ne mu yi amfani da kyawawan hanyoyin amfani da kayan aiki na musamman da aka haɗa cikin software ɗinmu. Daga kauce wa sake amfani da adireshi zuwa CoinJoin, ta hanyar haɗa kuɗin ku da haɗawa da node ɗin ku, za mu taimaka muku a cikin tafiyarku zuwa sirri.

general.description: A zamanin sa ido na taron jama'a, dawo da wani matakin sirri a rayuwarku ta yau da kullum yana da matuƙar muhimmanci. Tunda kowanne mai amfani zai kasance da wani matakin fargaba da ilimin fasaha, yana da kyau sosai a yi amfani da wasu kayan aiki da kuma daidaita su da bukatunku. A nan, za mu bincika hanyoyi daban-daban na kariya kamar VPNs, Tor, Tails OS, PGP, rufaffun saƙonni, da sauransu.

wallet.description: Walat na Bitcoin kamar makullin ku ne. Yana ba ku damar kashewa da karɓar bitcoin. Akwai nau'ikan walat da yawa, kowanne na da banbancin amfani, ayyuka, farashi, da ƙwarewar mai amfani. Kowanne mai amfani da Bitcoin zai yi amfani da na'ura daban bisa ga bukatunsu, matakin gaggawa, da ƙwarewa.

mobile.description: Walatin wayar hannu yawanci ana amfani da su don kashe kuɗi na yau da kullum. Suna haɗewa da Hanyar Lightning don mu'amaloli da ke da ƙananan kuɗi da sauri. Yawanci suna haɗe da intanet (yawanci ana kiran su "walat masu zafi") kuma saboda haka suna da ƙarancin tsaro fiye da walatin kayan hannu. Ya kamata a yi amfani da su don adana ƙananan adadin bitcoin, ku yi la'akari da su a matsayin walat ɗin ku na yau da kullum a aljihunku.

wallet.shortDescription: Hanyoyin tsaro da amfani da bitcoins ɗinku
wallet.title: Walat

desktop.description: Walatin tebur yawanci suna kasancewa ga masu amfani da suka fi ƙwarewa, yayin da suke haɗa amfani da na'urorin kayan aiki da software na walat na tebur. Kamar samun sabuwar fuska mai al'ada da ke da ayyuka masu yawa don na'urar ku ta kayan aiki. Irin waɗannan walat suna ba da zaɓuɓɓukan sa hannu da yawa, siffofin sirri, hanyoyin haɗawa na gado, da sauransu.

hardware.description: Walatin hannu yawanci ana amfani da su don ajiye kuɗin bitcoin na dogon lokaci. Na'urori ne na zahiri da ba su haɗe da intanet (yawanci ana kiran su "walat masu sanyi") kuma yawanci suna da tsaro sosai. Kodayake waɗannan na'urorin yawanci suna da tushen bude game da software ɗin su, farashin kayan aikin yana tsakanin euro 50 zuwa 300. Yi la’akari da waɗannan na’urorin a matsayin asusun banki don manyan adadin ajiyar da za ku yi amfani da su lokaci-lokaci.

underConstruction.p1: Zomo ya fada cikin rami. Saboda wannan ba zato ba tsammani, wannan shafin yana ƙarƙashin gini a halin yanzu. Muna ba da hakuri kan duk wata matsala. Tawagar mu na aiki tukuru don kammala wannan shafin. Idan kuna da sha'awar bayar da taimako, don Allah kar ku yi shakkar tuntubarmu
underConstruction.p2: kuma ku yi yunkurin shiga cikin al'ummarmu!
underConstruction.itemNotFoundOrTranslated: {{item}} bai samu ba, ko kuma ba a fassara shi zuwa harshenka/ki ba

words.sponsoringAndContributors: Masu tallafawa da masu ba da gudummawa
